keyMappings:
unmapAll

# Navigating the page
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight

map J scrollPageDown
map K scrollPageUp
map H scrollFullPageUp
map L scrollFullPageDown

map g scrollToTop
map ; scrollToBottom

map r reload
map Y copyCurrentUrl
map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map i enterInsertMode
map I focusInput
map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map <C-f> LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab


# Using the vomnibar
map s Vomnibar.activate
map S Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map d Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map D Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

map a Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab


# Using find
map / enterFindMode
map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind


# Navigating history
map <c-h> goBack
map <c-l> goForward


# Manipulating tabs
map <c-j> nextTab
map <c-k> previousTab
map t createTab
map w moveTabToNewWindow
map u restoreTab
map x removeTab
map X closeOtherTabs
map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight


# Miscellaneous
map ? showHelp
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
